title: Energy dissipated by resistor in 60 seconds

content.description: In the circuit above, the emf's and the resistances have the values shown. The current ùêº in the circuit is 2 amperes.
content.question: How much energy is dissipated by the 1.5-ohm resistor in 60 seconds?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
